51899.summary: Some customers in the William Whyte area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51899.title: July 26 - Winnipeg (William Whyte) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
